This supplier has been audited by the b2b tradett.com >Add to Company Favorites Products Kitchen Equipment Total 80 Product(s) We are professional kitchen equipment factory and supplier in China.We can produce kitchen equipment according to your requirements.More types of kitchen equipment wanted,please contact us right now! View:
Gas Range 4 Burner With Oven US-RQ-4,US-RA-4 Gas Range 4 Burner With Oven is equipped with flame failure protection device and thermocouple safety device to make sure there will be no incident during its working. It is suitable for various gases such as LPG or Natural gas. Gas Range is widely used in commercial field such as restaurant and hotel supplies.
Gas Range With 3 Burner Cabinet JUS-RA-3 The body of this Gas range is made of 304 stainless steel to allow easy cleaning. sharp corner it is very easy to clean.Unique design prevent the water flow into the cooker. It is equipped with flame failure protection device and thermocouple safety device to make sure there will be no incident during its working.
Gas Range With 3 Burner Oven JUS-RQ-3 As a gas cooking equipment, it is suitable for various gases such as LPG or Natural gas. The new design burner allow the flame to be delivered quickly so that it can improve efficiency compare with others and there is a oven below the burner as well. It is widely used for restaurant and hotel supplies.
Hood Type Dishwasher YT88 HIGHT-YT88 dish washer has received CE certificate which has steady performance. Suitable for commercial kitchen such as restaurant and hotel.
Hotel Kitchen Dishwasher C88 We offer an extensive range of kitchen equipment that find wide applications in hotel, canteen, hospital etc. Our range is fabricated using premium quality stainless steel Grade 304 and galvanized iron that ensure corrosion resistance and durability.
Restaurant Kitchen Dishwasher HIGHT-C180 The Electric Dishwasher(commercial dishwasher) provide better sound dampening. All Stainless Steel .
Stainless Steel Conveyor Dishwasher HIGHT-C250 We offer an array of Stainless Steel Conveyor Dishwasher, which is highly demanded in various hotels, restaurants, canteens and commercial kitchens. Fabricated using high grade stainless steel, it is appreciated for its long service life, excellent performance and high efficiency.
Stainless Steel Electric Griddle GH-818 We are supported with advanced manufacturing unit that helps us to offer unmatched quality of Stainless Steel Electric Griddle to our clients at reasonable prices. Our range is available in different specifications and finds wide application in various sectors.
Grooved Electric Griddle GH-821 Considering the diverse requirements of hotels, restaurants and households, we bring Grooved Electric Griddles. These machines are reckoned for their easy operation and low maintenance. Our range is made using premium quality raw material and is designed with unique electric control system.
Stainless steel Electric Rotisserie YXD-208-L This Rotisserie equipped with high efficient heating system, high output in short time. Front clear door allow user to view the status of chicken.
Range Hood IN96 As we know that, range hood is the neccessary equipment for a kitchen. The main function for range hood is to remove the oil and smoke. To this range hood , there are several fans for your selection. Customer can add an oil and smoke filter as well.
Bench Cabinet With Sliding Doors DM72 Bench Cabinet is made of high quality stainless steel has no sharp corner it is very easy to clean.
6 Tray Electric Combi Steamer EWR-06-11-L The self cooking center from rational puts a limitless culinary variety at your disposal – baking, roasting, grilling, steaming, braising, blanching, poaching and much more, all in a single unit. Everything from meat, fish, poultry, side dishes or bakery products, it recognizes product, size&batch and cooks everything to the point of perfection.
Ceramic Hob Oven JZH-HQ-4,JZH-HP-4 Heavy duty gas burner with individual switch and thermostat Adjustable legs Devices are preset to city gas natural or LGP KEY-component from famous international suppliersGlass cooking zone ,easy to clean unique design to prevent flow-water into the cooker
Dish Washing Kitchen Equipment XWJ-XD-25 The body of this dish washing machine is made of 304 stainless steel.Water pump and microcomputer control circuit is import from famous international suppliers. Suitable for commercial kitchen such as restaurant and hotel.
Commercial 10 Tray Electric Combi Steamer EWR-10-11-M The combi-steamer fulfils all cooking programs,such as baking,broiling,cooking and steaming for making many kinds of food.It is widely used in commercial kitchen such as restaurant and hotel.
10 Tray Electric Combi Steamer WR-10-11 This range of ovens is designed with double walled structure, which creates air pressurized passage with vertical hot air or cross air flow system for uniform temperature. Depending on the size and type of application, the ovens are provided with single / double hinged doors and trolleys.
Commercial Electric Pressure Fryer PFE-600 This kind of Electric Pressure fryer is widely used in commercial kitchen such as restaurant and hotel. Seriously quality control ensure the working performance for this kitchen equipment. Meanwhile, it has received CE Approval.
Stainless Steel Electric Pressure Fryer PFE-800 This model of Electric Pressure Fryer has received CE certificate and it meets international hygiene and safety standard.It is equiped with auto oil filter and computer control system.
Gas Fryer EF-72A Gas Fryer is widely used in commercial kitchen such as Restaurant kitchen or hotel kitchen. The body of this gas fryer is made of 304 stainless steel without sharp coner. High efficiency heating element allow food to be fried in short time. It is equipped with electronic ignition to ensure the safety.
